Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.11 Hetuduka, Sekkhattika » 1.11.2 Asekkhapada » 1.11.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Sekkhattika
Asekkhapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
338.
707Hetuṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
708Nahetuṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu asakkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
709Hetuṃ asekkhañca nahetuṃ asekkhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
339.
710Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, kamme nava, vipāke nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Naadhipati >>
